data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Raymond Realty Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from July 01 2025 the equity shares of Raymond Realty Ltd  (Scrip Code: 544420) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of T Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250627-21 dated June 27 2025
